title: Magic Watchface-Interactive
summary: Collection of 40+ interactive watch faces for MOTO 360, Huawei Watch and others!

descriptionHTML:
One of the favorite watch faces of David Singleton, Engineer Director of Android Wear and VP of Google !

All the interactive watch faces created by Magic Team are here, original, beautiful and unique.
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

5 kinds of interactive watch faces
Traditional Watch Face
Digital Watch Face
Creative Watch Face
Watch Face created by Designer
Watch Face created by user

Lots of Functions
Health Care Center
When you are walking or running outside, your activities will be recorded in your smart watch. Our faces can show it through the steps indicator, which include:
-Current steps and steps histories
-Daily steps goal
-The distance you’ve walked
-The calories you’ve burned
-Heart rate

Weather Forecast
If you care about the weather very much, our faces can help you with that. We provide the following weather information:
-Current temperature
-Highest and lowest temperature
-16 days weather forecast

We also provide functions of Battery, Moon phase, Alarm, Compass, help yourself to find out.

Supported devices:
All Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

Update History
version date
1.0.0 2015-9-1
1.1.0 2015-9-26
1.2.0 2015-10-14
1.2.1 2015-11-5
1.2.2 2015-11-15
1.2.3 2015-11-27
1.2.6 2015-12-23

How to use

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings, this may takes a few minutes even hours.
-When the icon of Magic is in your Android Wear APP, you can select it as your face.


About us:
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
comments: Almost Many good features about this app Such as awesome stock faces and cool customization,  but the weather is very inaccurate. Living in San Diego   I am fairly certain it's not going to rain for the next 3 weeks straight,  and it's not 82° at 8pm in February.  Inaccurate weather can be a deal breaker for most smart watch owners.  Fix the weather problem and I give 5 stars.

Please fix the weather The weather  currently displays 77°F. It is 10°F here. Obviously wrong. Isn't the app able to use phone location? I am uninstalling until fixed. May have to cancel my subscription as well.
They're nice But there's no access to settings, the weather didn't appear to work, and the G+ community appears to have been abandoned
Great and simple watch faces. I'd love to give it 5 stars, but a lot of the really neat faces are only available in 24 hour mode with no ability to toggle it to 12 hour.
Awesome faces to choose from, but... ...weather reports as 82 degrees every day. I live in Illinois, so this is quite impossible in March!

No Square watch face faces All the watch faces are for round wears and nothing for square face. Although its applicable to square but it will be better if you provide settings to choose between square and round.
